1st Person EVA

Edited April 27, 2021 by DrRafa
.

I feel like having only one kerbal on EVA at a time is probably not a good game limit, but it seems like that you meant 1st person EVA. I believe having 1st person EVA with the insane graphics would make the game wayyyy more immersive, and just looking at your crafts in the eyes of a kerbal would be amazing. Although there may be constraints that I'm not aware of, I feel like this could be feasible for KSP 2.
